    • makeDiagraph

      public MultiMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> makeDiagraph​(java.lang.String[] words)
      Transform a array of words in a diagraph multimap.
      Parameters:
      words - string array of words already treated
      Returns:
      a multimap in a diagraph format, made of the given string array.

    • diagraphToString

      public java.lang.String diagraphToString​(MultiMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> mm, char separator)
      Transforms a multimap that is already a diagraph in a string, with the correct formatting for be used in Gephi app.
      Parameters:
      mm - the multimap with diagraph mapped
      separator - the char that will separate each of the values
      Returns:
      the mutimap converted to a single string
